page.title: 09LANDSCAPE,BUILDINGS_EVENJOBB
page.content: EVENJOBB & KINNERTON AREA IS MAINLY IN THE VALLEY,HOWEVER LAND RISES IN THE EAST TO OVER 12OO FT.BURFA,THE OLDEST KNOWN DWELLING,DATES IN PART FROM THE 15TH CENTURY. COURT COTTAGES & COTTAGE FARM ARE 17TH CENTURY HOUSES.THE TIMBERFRAMED LOWER HOUSE IS ALSO ELIZ_ ABETHAN BUT EVENJOBB COURT & HYMNS FARM ARE SOMEWHAT MORE RECENT. HORSE_ YARD & KINNERTON COURT SHOW GEORGIAN INFLUENCE.MOST OF THE COTTAGES DATE FROM THE EARLY 19TH CENTURY & ARE MADE OF LOCAL STONE. THE 2 COUNTRY HOUSES, NEWCASTLE & EVANCOYD,ALSO BELONG TO THIS PERIOD.2 COUNCIL HOUSES WERE BUILT IN KINNERTON IN THE 193OS & MORE WERE ADDED IN THE 1950S.EVENJOBB HAS 6 POSTWAR COUNCIL HOUSES & IN THE LAST DECADE, 13 NEW BUNGALOWS HAVE BEEN BUILT THERE. 2 BUNGALOWS HAVE BEEN BUILT RECENTLY IN KINNERTON.
